description.en: Preceptor by name Mahādevendra adorning Pīṭha attained siddhi on the first day (pratipat) of bright fortnight of Phālguna month in the year Parābhava. The name of this preceptor before initiation was Lakṣminārāyaṇa. His father was well-known as Narasimhaśāstri. This preceptor was well-versed in Ṛgveda. His place of sidhi was Kalavai village in Śalivahana era 1830.

shlokas:
lakSmInarasiMhayugalaputrO lakSmIkAntO guruvarasEvAm.
EkAM kRtvA vaTurapi bhikSuH kASThAM prAptO jananam atItAm..21..
trivizalUr‌grAmajAtaH ziSyamAtragrajAsutaH.
traiviSTapairdurbhajaM sacchiSyatAmAtratO'bhajat..22..
kalavainAmakE grAmE svagurOrEva sannidhau.
A'ntaM tasyaiva zuzrUSAM kRtvA dEhAntam AptavAn..23..
gururmahAdEvEndrAkhyaH saptAhI siddhim Ayayau.
parAbhavE phAlgunE tu zuklAyAM pratipattithau..24..
—puNyazlOkamaJjarI
